name: Francisco Soares' page
body:
### Who am I
Hello. I'm a graduate student currently enrolled for my Doctorate degree at the [Informatics Center](http://cin.ufpe.br) of the Federal University of Pernambuco (UFPE). My research interests are mainly software engineering and programming languages (especially functional PLs). I hold a B.Eng. degree in Computer Engineering from the [Polytechnic School of Pernambuco](http://poli.upe.br), part of the State University of Pernambuco (UPE), where I did research on fault-tolerance for grid computing, and a M.Sc. degree in Computer Science from the my current university, on refactoring Concurrent Haskell programs and Software Transactional Memory. In all instances I have worked under Prof. Fernando Castor (@fernandocastor), and have been co-advised on my M.Sc. by Prof. Andr√© Santos.

I currently divide my time between my graduate research and teaching iOS development. Previously I have worked as a Systems Engineer at [usto.re](ustore.com.br), and as a Software Engineer developing mobile apps at [Fingertips](http://ftips.com.br).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
